ratings.comment: I really don't understand where the low rating is coming from. Ludmila is a caring, respectful teacher. Yes, there was a lot of homework - however, it was well-structured and purposeful - meaning I knew why I was doing it. Imrpoved my writing skills. Lectures were interesting. I liked working in groups

She is unsympathetic. Assigns excessive homework but barely teaches. Forces too much unnecessary discussion with classmates. Learning comes from peers, not lectures. Unreasonably strict on attendance—one minute late matters. No empathy for students' workloads and assigns irrelevant work. Creates a stressful, ineffective learning environment.
Really bad teacher, hated her whole .

Bad lecturer, I heard many people say she was awful, but decided to give her a chance and they were right, tough grader, non-understanding if you have a problem. She told me to drop the course multiple times and to be aware of the dropping deadline. Also I had a B grade overall but she Failed me because I missed 2 points on the final project

Lidka is a great lecturer whom I met last year when I first came to this school. Her lectures were engaging and I could see that she really cares for her student, academically and personally. I admit that she might be a tough grader sometimes but she really deserves a better rate.

She is a Erwin Schrödinger's grader. You'll never know the exact reason why your points were deducted sharply unless you become a mind reader. What's more, she'll fail you based on the class rules even you have explained your special/urgent situations. This is unreasonable unless your mind converges to hers from an eccentric angle in unreal space.
A wonderful teacher and a wonderful person. Made a pretty boring dry class really enjoyable and useful.

I can never understand what she said in class. What I did most in her class is discuss and write my essay. I think i did not learn anything from her class. I once submitted a bad homework because of a midterm, she just told me to drop the course.
Tough grader and vague instructions. Does not tell you why you get a certain score on a certain assignment. Grading by imagination and preference. Too much group discussion and little lecture.

She is very kind and nice!! Although she is a tough grader and gives tons of homework, she does give a lot of useful advice on your paper. The only thing you need to do is to participate. She does not teach that good but it is too low as 1.9 for a nice teacher.

Her homework instructions aren't clear and she gives way too many of them, sometimes unnecessary ones. When I go to her lectures, I feel like I am attending a middle school class. She doesn't have an organized flow of what she wants to teach and wastes the time with unnecessary group works. However, she is sweet.
Not helpful at all. TOOOOOOO much homework and assignments. The feedback is always inconclusive and hard to understand. Do NOT take her class!!!!

Lidka is a tough grader, and she focuses on making you learn. She puts effort into the class and expects the same from you. She's also really adorable and kind if you do your work properly, and can be lenient and helpful if she sees you're in trouble. She's the perfect mix between strict and caring. Her class was great, and she was super helpful.
Shes lazy and strick . Doesnt help you.

Really tough grader. Sometimes taking points off of mysterious reasons. She does little teaching in class and uses most of the class for group discussion and group works. When she does teach, she does it poorly. AVOID  AT ALL COSTS.
Boring, extreme amounts of HW, and makes you regret taking this course in the first place.
She's very vague about her homework, unrealistic homework & boring lectures. Avoid at ALL costs.
An extreme amount of HW!
Lidka wasn't that bad. She's tough with her grading, but overall she's likely to help you out if you ever needed any help. She's kinda nice too!

She has a lot of homework and grades meanly. She is always smiling but actually she is extremely strict. When you ask her something, she always doesn't answer directly you but asks "what do you think". But if I know how to do this why do I ask you?
Her class is boring and soooo many HW!

Rao gives a lot of handouts and homework. Her commons on writings are really detailed and useful. But sometime it is impossible to let her help you, cuz she answer every question you ask with "it comes with experience"! Another thing is she always dismisses 5min+ late//
Her class was not interesting. But she gave me very detailed comments on the assignments.
She does not teach anything, but expects a lot of participation. Very harsh, unfair ways of grading. She had office hours, but not that helpful. Avoid at all costs.
I dislike her grading systems. its so messed up!!
the class is not easy at all. the work load is very heavy. however, she helps you with a lot of the stuff!! Very friendly and helpful!!
